name: Commando (itch) (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy. Original version by Richard Ikin & Ray Tredoux - Elite Systems Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5 by László Rajcsányi (WLS)

You are Super Joe, the crack combat soldier, equipped with only an M60 machine gun, you must carry out your lone crusade forcing your way into hostile territory. Your mission is to invade each of the four areas, cleaning each one of your opponents before finally destroying your objective, the enemy fortress. Watch out, because your mission will end even if you get behind the enemy!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Start
Move: Arrow Keys
Fire: A or B 

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys
Fire: X or CTRL or Z or Alt

http://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Commando
